resources.string: use system proxy as next socks proxy
Inside the Wi-Fi network settings, look for an option called \'Proxy\' or \'Advanced\' settings. Tap on it and select \'Manual.\' Enter the Proxy hostname and Port number:

Under the \'Wireless & networ&s\' or \'Connections\' section, find and tap on \'Wi-Fi.\' Here, you\'ll see a list of available networks. Tap the Wi-Fi network you\'re connected to or want to connect to.
Go to your Android device\'s Settings menu. Depending on your device, this might be accessed through an icon in the apps menu or by pulling down the notification bar and tapping the gear icon.
